original_text: then I also will walk contrary to you, and I myself will strike you sevenfold for your sins.
korean_text: 나 곧 나도 너희에게 대항하여 너희 죄로 말미암아 너희를 칠 배나 더 치리라

sentences.original_text: then I also will walk contrary to you
and I myself will strike you sevenfold for your sins
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 친히 너희를 너희 죄 때문에 일곱 배로 치리라
